variable.name: STUDY
variable.description: DbGaP top-level study or substudy accession: phs000342.v4.p6 Framingham SHARe, phs000282.v5.p6 Framingham CARe, phs000363.v3.p6 Framingham SABRe, and phs000307.v1.p6 Framingham Medical Resequencing

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
Both SNP genotypes and whole exome sequence data are available
Expression data for total RNA sample

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository
